org.robolectric.shadows
Class ShadowAnimation

java.lang.Object
  org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowAnimation
Direct Known Subclasses:
ShadowAlphaAnimation, ShadowTranslateAnimation
@Implements(value=android.view.animation.Animation.class)
public class ShadowAnimation
extends Object

Shadow implementation of Animation that provides support for invoking listener callbacks.
